suncertify.db.domain
Class FileMetaData

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.db.domain.FileMetaData

public final class FileMetaData
extends java.lang.Object

Metadata of a data file.

This includes all fields in the file header and schema description section.

Provides methods to calculate aggregated properties (e.g. record length, offset of a record within the file).

FileMetaData

public FileMetaData(java.lang.String pathname,
                    int magicCookieValue,
                    int offset,
                    short fieldCount,
                    SchemaDescription[] schemaDescriptions)
Constructs a new FileMetaData instance.

Parameters:
pathname - name of the file
magicCookieValue - magic cookie value
offset - offset to start of record zero
fieldCount - number of fields in each record
schemaDescriptions - schema description section

getFieldSchemaDescription

public SchemaDescription getFieldSchemaDescription(int i)
Returns the schema description with the given index. If the index is not legal in the schema description section, an IndexOutOfBoundsException is thrown.

Parameters:
i - index into schema description section
Returns:
schema description at the given index

getFieldLength

public short getFieldLength(int i)
Returns the length of the field with the given index. If the index is not legal in the schema description section, an IndexOutOfBoundsException is thrown.

Parameters:
i - index of the field
Returns:
field length at the given index

field name at the given index
